text: arau utara duta o garaura duta. Koraa, ‘te'om mata dutaka nisid'dha karaiche ne ma'iki dutaka, ne ma'iki dutara garbhata yi ache seya nisid'dha karaiche’? Ne allahe yetiya tomalokaka e'ibora nirdesa dana karaichila tetiya tomaloke upasthita achila? Gatike yi byakti najanakai manuhaka bibhraanta karaara babe allaha samparke micha ratana karae tatakai danara yalima arau kona ha’ba parae? Niscaya allahe yalima sampradayaka hidayata nakarae
